page.title: 14Footpaths in the Ashey area
page.content: Our area contains footpaths and bridleways. There are horses living in the area and we found plenty of hoofprints on the downs showing use by locals and visitors. Some of the{local paths}in the North of our area are boggy and seemed little used whereas the paths on the downs were well worn. The County has just opened a new path called the Downs Way.It runs alongside the road and joins lots of other paths. One area currently in{dispute}between the landowner and the County is around Ashey.The Council wants to rationalise the routes near Eagleshead and put a new path up to the seamark from the road.The landowner wants to eradicate all routes near his farm buildings. This year a bridleway along the old railway has been closed.
